data.answer: Ultrasonic treatment followed by heating in a Teflon-lined autoclave

Can M-gallate selectively adsorb SO2 over CO2?

data.answer: Moisture has a tiny effect, causing a slight decrease in adsorption capacity

data.question: What is the crystal structure change of Ni-gallate after activation?
data.answer: It changes from P3221 to P3121 space group

data.question: Is the thermal stability of M-gallate sufficient for industrial applications?

data.answer: Multiple hydrogen bonds and micropore confinement

data.question: Does the crystallinity of M-gallate remain intact after exposure to SO2?
What is the purpose of using helium gas in the initial outgassing process before gas adsorption measurements?
data.answer: To determine the free space of the system

data.question: What is the highest SO2/N2 selectivity achieved on M-gallate?

What is the effect of adding protected polar groups to MFM-601?
data.answer: It improves the reversibility of the adsorption process

data.answer: To understand the interactions between MOFs and SO2

data.question: What is the main challenge in deep desulfurization processes?
data.answer: Developing adsorbents with high capture capacity especially at low partial pressure
